channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Left road works barriers, 25th July
item.description:
For nearly 1 year these red and white barriers have been left here. They have not been picked up. It was for the duration of work being performed here to protect workers but this is nearly 1 year ago now.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattresses, fridge, wardrobe, 25th July
item.description:
The rubbish outside this house has been piling up for months. It’s unsightly and of course the fridge is a serious safety concern when it comes go children. There is a primary school at the top of out road. I don’t know who lives there - if anyone.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Hearns Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 25th July
item.description:
This car has been here for over 3 months and not moved. All neighbours have been asked if it’s theirs. The car has been abandoned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Monmouth Close, Welling, London

item.title: Trees outside 49 to 35 Buckland Crescent, 25th July
item.description:
Overgrown lower branches make passage difficult to people walking, impossible to people with buggies or in wheelchairs without getting scratched. They need cutting back urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Buckland Crescent, Belsize Park, London

item.description:
Since 15 July 2025, I have reported two serious issues at Patten House, Flats 15–28, London N4 2NY, which have not been resolved and are affecting residents' safety and hygiene. Blocked rubbish chute (5th floor) The chute has been blocked for over two wee

item.title: Overgrown weeds on footpath, 25th July
item.description:
Completely overgrown weeds on the side near the fences. The maintenance team who cut the grass on the grass area have not touched the weeds on the path. It is now blocking some areas. Please can the team in charge of looking after the grass, sort this out

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Michleham Down, Woodside Park, London
